Commit.message: refactor code fixing bug on ticket 1
Refactor code for reducing code smells (ticket 3)
completed shop rendering optimization on the frontend / ticket 4

Defect.description: Application database was deleted with SQL Injection

Feature.description: Log in of a car rental webpage
Register of a car rental webpage
Checkout of a car renting webage
Shop gallery showing all available products

QualityRule.name: Credentials should not be hard-coded
QualityRule.compliance: There are no credentials inside the codebase

QualityRule.name: OS commands should not be vulnerable to command injection attacks
QualityRule.compliance: Usage of OS commands should not be modifiable by users

QualityRule.name: Cipher algorithms should be robust
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not be vulnerable to well-known attacks like brute force attacks

QualityRule.name: Weak SSL/TLS protocols should not be used
QualityRule.compliance: Communications performed by the application need to be secure for protecting user information

QualityRule.name: Environment variables should not be defined from untrusted input
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not be vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks or archieve code execution

QualityRule.name: Loops should not be infinite
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not get stuck due to an infinite loop

QualityRule.name: Recursion should not be infinite
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not get stuck due to an infinite recursion

QualityRule.name: Regular expressions should be syntactically valid
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have fails when manipulating text with regex

QualityRule.name: Zero should not be a possible denominator
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have mathematical errors

QualityRule.name: Assertions should not be used in production code
QualityRule.compliance: Test code should not be in production for any reason

QualityRule.name: Hard-coded secrets are security-sensitive
QualityRule.compliance: Secrets should be stored outside of the source code in a configuration file or a management service.

QualityRule.name: Configuring loggers is security-sensitive
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have logs that are accessible to users

QualityRule.name: Formatting SQL queries is security-sensitive
QualityRule.compliance: Use parameterized queries, prepared statements, or stored procedures and bind variables instead

QualityRule.name: Using long-term access keys is security-sensitive
QualityRule.compliance: Access keys should be short-term in order to avoid problems in case of exposures.

QualityRule.name: Using hardcoded IP addresses is security-sensitive
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have IP addresses on the source code.

QualityRule.name: Cognitive Complexity of methods should not be too high
QualityRule.compliance: The application methods should be as simple as possible for improving maintenance

QualityRule.name: Regular expressions should not be too complicated
QualityRule.compliance: The application regex should be as simple as possible for improving maintenance

QualityRule.name: Silly math should not be performed
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have any silly math (I.E. anyValue % 1 will always return 0)

QualityRule.name: Unused assignments should be removed
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have unused assignments in order to improve maintenance

QualityRule.name: Methods should not return constants
QualityRule.compliance: The application should not have misleading methods

Ticket.definitionOfDone: Application's Log in should not allow SQL Injection anymore
Ticket.title: Fix log in vulnerability

Ticket.definitionOfDone: The application should have a working calculator for estimating renting prices
Ticket.title: Create a car renting calculator

Ticket.definitionOfDone: Remove all the code smells detected on the rent checkout class
Ticket.title: Refactor checkout class

Ticket.definitionOfDone: Shop renderization time should not take more than 3 seconds and all the text should be legible
Ticket.title: Optimize shop page
